meanings.definition: The process of introducing an acyl group into a compound.
meanings.sent1: During the acylations, a new acyl group is added to the compound.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study acylations to understand chemical reactions better.
meanings.sent3: The acylations at the lab were so precise, they made the compound dance!
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in acylations transformed the compound into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The acylations were like a colorful puzzle, fitting perfectly into the compound.

meanings.definition: The introduction of an acyl group into a compound.
meanings.sent1: The introduction of acylations changed the compound's properties.
meanings.sent2: Chemists use acylations to modify the structure of compounds.
meanings.sent3: The compound welcomed the acylations with open arms, literally!
meanings.sent4: His idea was an acylation of creativity injected into the project.
meanings.sent5: The acylations were like a secret ingredient, enhancing the compound's nature.
